title: Andreessen Horowitz will no longer be a venture capital firm, opting to become an investment advisor
text: Venture capital firm Andreessen Horowitz filed to become a registered investment advisor so that it can have more flexibility.

title: Stocks Face Possible Challenges From Rising Bonds, Brexit Concerns
text: The bond market, which got beaten down Monday, looks like it is staging a bit of a rally early Tuesday.

title: The Rising Risk of Stock Ownership
text: As someone who is immersed in the investment markets each day, there are things you notice anecdotally that, when you actually run the data on them, you realize you were not just imagining things.

title: From Apple To Edibles: Défoncé CEO Says He Created Brand 'For People That Enjoy And Appreciate Chocolate'
text: Last year, Jeff Siegel wrote an article for Benzinga highlighting Défoncé, “an infused chocolate-maker that’s completely raised the bar in terms of high-end edibles,” as a prime acquisition target in the cannabis industry.

title: Singapore Airlines grounds two 787-10s citing Rolls-Royce engine problem
text: Singapore Airlines Ltd said on Tuesday it had grounded two Boeing Co 787-10 jets fitted with Rolls-Royce Holdings PLC Trent 1000 TEN engines.

title: Bitcoin Price Crossed $5,000. What Is Behind The Rally?
text: Bitcoin added nearly $15 billion in a single day by breaking the level of $5,000.

title: Is The Stock Market As Confused As You Are About A Recession?
text: Being optimistic about the economy and the markets currently is far more entertaining than doom and gloom.

title: Looming downturn won't slow M&A for consumer and retail companies, but spotlight is on customers, not scale
text: Major consumer and retail companies are looking to mergers and acquisitions to strengthen their portfolios in the face of an anticipated economic slowdown by the end of 2019, a new report predicts.

title: Europe's answer to Uber expands into the electric scooter scene in Madrid
text: Bolt, formerly known as Taxify, is launching its electric kick scooter-sharing service in Madrid.
